data.title: Книжковий Арсенал
data.text:
John Paul II and His Ties with Ukraine. Meeting on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of Pope John Paul II visit to Ukraine, the presentation of his books. Literary Program

Польський Інститут у Києві, Polish Institute in Kyiv, The Superior Institute of Religious Sciences of St. Thomas Aquinas

Bishop Vitaliy Kryvytskyi, His Beatitude Sviatoslav (Shevchuk), Fr. Petro Baloh, Robert Chyzhevskyi

Discussion “Inclusion among us”. Literary program

Іnternational literature project “The Coronation of the Word”

Olena Osmolovska, Oleksandr Kozynets, Mariana Lelyk, Nataliia Tchaikovska, Olesia Markovych

Arsenal of Coronation Novelties. Literary program

Іnternational literature project “The Coronation of the Word”

Olha Salipa, Vasyl Kras, Anna Bahriana, Iren Rozdobudko

Lecture “Moving pictures – between animation and illustration”. Illustrative workshops

The Embassy Of Switzerland in Ukraine

Amélie Cochet

SAY “LIGHT”. Project presentation

ArtPole Agency. Supported by the Austrian Cultural Forum

Olia Mykhailiuk, Dmytro Lider, Serhiy Piliavets, performative group LAB ON STAGE (Austria, online), Tania Rodionova

Biblioshow “Reader’s Fan Club. TOP-10 questions for writers from children “

The National Library of Ukraine for Children

Olha Shemota, Anna Polehenko, Sofiia Polehenko, Inna Holovina
